content.value:
You want to talk about how the internet is the only remaining bastion of expression, identity, and free speech?

Well imagine a world where only the hyper wealthy can afford the tools to access this space of marginalized refuge.

That world is 2022 if we don't act now.
content.html: You want to talk about how the internet is the only remaining bastion of expression, identity, and free speech? Well imagine a world where only the hyper wealthy can afford the tools to access this space of marginalized refuge. That world is 2022 if we don't act now.

content.value:
At the rate crypto-capitalist exploitation is progressing, we won't be able to produce anything that requires a data processor or flash bit storage by the end of the year.

And well...that's pretty much everything.

We're rapidly sprinting towards the neo dark ages.
content.html: At the rate crypto-capitalist exploitation is progressing, we won't be able to produce anything that requires a data processor or flash bit storage by the end of the year. And well...that's pretty much everything. We're rapidly sprinting towards the neo dark ages.
